detail_desc: Long-sleeved shirt in a cotton blend with an easy-iron finish. Turn-down collar, classic front, narrow cuffs with adjustable buttoning, darts at the back and a rounded hem. Slim fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.
Jacket in a cotton twill weave with a collar and buttons at the front. Flap chest pockets with a button, shoulder tabs, long sleeves with a tab and button, and a tie belt at the waist. Unlined.
Treggings in sturdy, stretch jersey with concealed elastication at the waist.
Dungaree shorts in washed cotton denim with hard-worn details. Adjustable straps, a chest pocket and side and back pockets. Buttons at the sides, a fake fly and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Long-sleeved top in nepped linen-blend jersey with a lace frill trim at the hem.
Short, high-waisted skirt in a textured weave with a sheen. Pleats at the top, a concealed zip at the back, and side pockets. Unlined.
Sports vest top in fast-drying functional fabric with narrow, overlocked edges around the armholes and hem. Slightly longer and rounded at the back.
Short imitation suede skirt with a high paper bag waist.
Thong body in lace with narrow adjustable shoulder straps, a lined gusset and string back.
Fully lined bandeau bikini top with side support, gathers in the sides and a metal fastener at the back.
Fine-knit, short-sleeved dress in a cotton blend containing glittery threads with a decorative bow at the neck.
Rib-knit, shaftless socks in a soft cotton blend.
5-pocket shorts in stretch denim with an adjustable elasticated waist and zip fly and button.
Short shorts in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated, drawstring waist, side pockets and rounded hems.
Sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with taped details and short raglan sleeves. Rounded and longer at the back.
Metal lapel pins with a decoration at the top. Length of pin approx. 8 cm.

Shirt in a woven, stretch cotton blend with a cutaway collar, French front and yoke at the back. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slim Fit – a fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.
Sleeveless, flared V-neck tunic in an airy weave with a rounded hem. The polyester content of the tunic is partly recycled.
Sleeveless top in a crinkled viscose weave in a narrow cut with gathers at the top and short, narrow shoulder straps. Lace trim around the armholes.
Non-wired bikini top with a tie detail at the front and moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps and an adjustable fastening at the back.
V-neck cardigan in a soft rib knit containing some wool. Relaxed fit with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and buttons down the front. The polyester content of the cardigan is recycled.
Short-sleeved shirt in a patterned cotton weave with a resort collar, French front, yoke at the back and straight-cut hem.
Short-sleeved shirt in a patterned cotton weave with a yoke at the back and a rounded hem.

prod_name: CA Hector Slim fit stretch TVP
detail_desc: Shirt in a stretch weave made from a cotton blend with a collar and classic front. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a gently rounded hem. Slim Fit – a fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.
Ankle boots in sturdy jersey with pointed toes and a soft, stretchy shaft. Fabric linings, imitation leather insoles and rubber soles. Heel 10.5 cm.
5-pocket, high-waisted trousers in washed stretch twill with a zip fly and button, and slim legs.
Hair scarf in an airy, patterned weave that can be tied around the head or neck. Size 16x22 cm.
Acetate earrings with rectangular pendants. Length 4.6 cm.
Fitted top in soft jersey with a wide lace trim at the top, 3/4-length raglan sleeves and gathers in the sides for best fit over the tummy.
Short jumper in a rib-knit viscose blend with long sleeves and a V-neck with lacing at the front.
Bras in microfibre with underwired, padded cups that shape the bust and provide extra-firm support. Wide, adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Pyjama bottoms in a cotton weave with an elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets.
Jacquard-knit socks in a soft cotton blend.

Short dress in an airy weave with embroidery at the front, an opening with a button at the back of the neck and long puff sleeves with buttoned, flounced cuffs. Concealed zip in one side, a gathered seam at the waist and a gently bell-shaped skirt.
Long-sleeved top in soft, organic cotton jersey.
Joggers in sweatshirt fabric made from a soft cotton blend with an elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets. Legs with contrasting colour stripes down the sides and ribbed hems.
Long-sleeved jacket in printed sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood, zip down the front, side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Set with a short-sleeved top and pair of treggings. Top in cotton jersey with a reversible sequin motif on the front (size 1½-3Y with normal sequins). Treggings in sturdy, patterned jersey with a fake fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Twisted tube scarf in a soft knit.
Cap in a patterned weave with an appliqué on the front and mesh back with an adjustable plastic fastener.
Large square scarf in a soft weave with fringe trims along the sides. Size 130x130 cm.
Jumper in a soft, loose-knit cotton blend with dropped shoulders, long, trumpet sleeves, a ribbed neckline and straight hem.
Aviator-style sunglasses with metal and plastic frames and tinted, UV-protective lenses.
Polo-neck top in a soft, brushed viscose blend with dropped shoulders and long sleeves.

Shirt in premium cotton with an easy-iron finish. Turn-down collar, French front, long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slim fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.

Short, sleeveless dress in jersey crêpe with a small opening at the front and button at the neckline, and a double-layered, gathered yoke at the shoulders and back. Seam and a narrow, detachable tie belt at the waist.

Running set with a hat, gloves and tube scarf in thermal fleece. Gloves with a reflective print and touchscreen-compatible material at the tops of the thumb and index finger. Hat and tube scarf with reflective appliqués.
Hat in soft, rib-knit cashmere with a turned-up hem.
KATE MORGAN x H&M. Cap in a patterned weave with a lightly brushed finish. Embroidery at the front and an adjustable plastic fastener at the back. Cotton lining.
Hair clips in painted metal with faux fur appliqués. Length 5 cm.
Top in soft sweatshirt fabric with sparkly-stone appliqués, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Three thin metal chain necklaces in various designs, two with a pendant. Adjustable length from 38-44 cm to 86-92 cm.
Wide, short top in soft organic cotton and modal jersey with short dolman sleeves. Rounded and longer at the back.

5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed, stretch denim with worn details. High waist, zip fly and button and skinny legs. Embrace – denim with a smart stretch function that moulds to the body for a comfortable, flattering silhouette.
Oversized cardigan in a soft, chunky knit with a deep V-neck, buttons down the front and ribbing around the opening. Low dropped shoulders and wide sleeves with ribbed cuffs.
Round-necked T-shirt in sturdy cotton piqué.
Vest tops in soft organic cotton jersey.
Short, fitted, off-the-shoulder dress in ribbed jersey with a concealed silicone trim at the top and long sleeves.Overlocked edges at the top, cuffs and hem.
T-shirt in a jacquard-knit cotton blend with short sleeves, an open chest pocket and slits in the sides.
Jumper in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Off-the-shoulder top in stretch viscose jersey with wide smocking at the top and short sleeves.
Vest tops in soft cotton jersey with a concealed press-stud on one shoulder.
Imitation leather sandals with a decorative appliqué at the front and a hook and loop tab. Imitation leather linings and insoles and thermoplastic (TPR) rubber soles.
Trainers in imitation suede with a small platform, lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Fabric linings and insoles and rubber soles. Platform front 2.5 cm, back 3.5 cm.

Set with a vest top and briefs in soft, ribbed cotton jersey. Vest top with a scalloped trim around the neckline and small bow at the top. Briefs with an elasticated waist and a scalloped edge and bow at the top.
Baby Exclusive. Shorts in a soft organic cotton weave with an elasticated drawstring waist and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Set of three pairs of hoop earrings and twenty-two pairs of studs in metal in various sizes and designs.

Super push-up bra in soft microfibre with underwired, thickly padded cups to maximise the bust and create a fuller cleavage. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a print motif on the front and a jersey-lined hood with a wrapover front. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Slightly shorter, gently fitted jacket in a textured bouclé weave with metal buttons down the front. Satin lining.

Fitted top in airy, patterned chiffon with a square neckline and long puff sleeves with elastication over the shoulders. Jersey-lined bodice with gathered seams at the front for a softly draping effect, and wide smocking at the back.
Shorts in a cotton weave with concealed, adjustable elastication and a button at the waist, fake fly, fake front pockets and a fake back pocket.
Short coat in soft faux shearling with notch lapels, concealed press-studs down the front and patch front pockets. Lined.
Long, loose-fitting off-the-shoulder dress in viscose crêpe containing glittery threads with elastication at the top and wide, raglan sleeves with elastication at the cuffs. Unlined.
Long-sleeved jumper in a soft, fine knit with slits and lacing at the sides.
Briefs in microfibre with a high waist, lined gusset and cutaway coverage at the back. The briefs are designed with the minimum number of seams for a more comfortable fit.
Swim pants with an elasticated waist, frill at the top and lined gusset. One patterned pair.
5-pocket slim-fit jeans in supersoft, stretch denim with an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and button, and straight hems.
Short, V-neck dress in cotton jersey with covered buttons down the front and short puff sleeves with narrow elastication at the hems. Seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt. Unlined.
Sandals with an adjustable strap with a metal buckle around the ankle. Imitation suede linings and insoles and rubber soles.
